sentences.sentence: Watermelon, cantaloupe and honeydew are all healthy options for your pooch.
sentences.translation: 西瓜、哈密瓜和蜜瓜都是狗狗的健康选择。

sentences.sentence: You could probably make this drink with watermelon or any other sweet melon, but I've only tried honeydew and cantaloupe.
sentences.translation: 你可以用西瓜或甜瓜做这道饮品，不过我只试过用蜜瓜和哈密瓜做。

sentences.sentence: Just as some ants farm the bugs called aphids for the honeydew they produce when they feed, so Google farms us for the data that our digital lives yield.
sentences.translation: 就像一些蚂蚁养殖一种叫做蚜虫的小虫，以获取它们进食时产生的蜜露一样，谷歌为了获取我们数字生活中产生的数据而“养殖”我们。
